trans-unit.source: Allows you to override attributes applied to properties, fields, and classes when you use an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize or deserialize an object as encoded SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 필드 및 클래스를 사용 하는 경우 속성에 적용 된 특성을 재정의할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>를 직렬화 또는 역직렬화 개체로 인코딩된 SOAP.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The SoapAttributeOverrides class enables an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override the default way of serializing a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: SoapAttributeOverrides 수 있도록 클래스는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>개체 집합을 직렬화 하는 기본 방법을 재정의 하.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Overriding serialization in this way has two uses: first, you can control and augment the serialization of objects found in a DLL, even if you do not have access to the source; second, you can create one set of serializable classes, but serialize the objects in multiple ways.
trans-unit.target: 용도 이러한 방식으로 직렬화를 재정의: 제어 하 고 원본;에 액세스할 수 없는 경우에 DLL에 있는 개체의 serialization을 보강할 수 먼저 둘째, 하나의 집합만 serializable 클래스를 만들 수 있지만 여러 가지 방법으로 개체를 직렬화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, instead of serializing members of a class instance as XML elements, you can serialize them as XML attributes, resulting in a more efficient document to transport.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 XML 요소로 클래스 인스턴스의 멤버를 직렬화 하는 대신 serialize 할 수 있습니다 이러한 XML 특성으로 보다 효율적으로 문서를 전송으로 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: After you create a SoapAttributeOverrides, you create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>클래스</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> 의 메서드</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> 를 사용 하 여</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> 만드는 SoapAttributeOverrides를 만든 후

trans-unit.source: Pass the resulting object as an argument to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 결과 개체에 대 한 인수로 전달 된 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the data contained by the SoapAttributeOverrides to override attributes that control how objects are serialized.
trans-unit.target: 그 결과 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>개체는 직렬화 하는 방법을 제어 하는 특성을 재정의 하는 SoapAttributeOverrides에 포함 된 데이터를 사용 하 여.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the SoapAttributeOverrides contains a collection of the object types that are overridden, as well as a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> associated with each overridden object type.
trans-unit.target: 이를 위해는 SoapAttributeOverrides 재정의 되는 개체 유형의 컬렉션을 포함 및 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>각 재정의 개체 유형과 관련 된.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains an appropriate set of attribute objects that control how each field, property, or class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 각 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>각 필드, 속성 또는 클래스 serialize 되는 방식을 제어 하는 특성 개체에 대 한 적절 한 집합이 포함 되어 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The process for creating and using a SoapAttributeOverrides is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: 만들고는 SoapAttributeOverrides 사용 하기 위한 프로세스는 다음과 같습니다: 1.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: 에 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> 만들기

trans-unit.source: Create an attribute object that is appropriate to the object being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 재정의 되는 개체에 적합 한 특성 개체를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, to override a field or property, create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, using the new, derived type.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 필드 또는 속성을 재정의 하려면 만들기를 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, new를 사용 하 여 파생 형식입니다.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can optionally assign a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A> that overrides the base class's attribute name or namespace.
trans-unit.target: 새 선택적으로 할당할 수 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>기본 클래스의 특성 이름이 나 네임 스페이스를 재정의 하는.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add the attribute object to the appropriate <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> property or collection.
trans-unit.target: 특성 개체를 적절 한 추가 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>속성 또는 컬렉션입니다.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> and specify the member name that is being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 설정 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>개체를 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>재정의 되는 멤버 이름을 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create a SoapAttributeOverrides.
trans-unit.target: SoapAttributeOverrides를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the SoapAttributeOverrides using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>사용 하 여 SoapAttributeOverrides는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: If the object being overridden is a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, you need only specify the type of the overridden object.
trans-unit.target: 개체가 재정의 되는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, 재정의 된 개체의 유형을 지정 하면.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: But if you are overriding a field or property, you must also specify the name of the overridden member.
trans-unit.target: 않지만 필드 또는 속성을 재정의 하는 경우 재정의 된 멤버의 이름을 지정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>클래스</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> 의 메서드</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> 를 사용 하 여</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> 만들기

trans-unit.source: When constructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, pass the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 생성할 때는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, 전달 된 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>에 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Use the resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize or deserialize the class objects.
trans-unit.target: 그 결과 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>를 직렬화 또는 클래스 개체를 역직렬화 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> to a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> 의 컬렉션에 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The type parameter specifies an object to be overridden by the .
trans-unit.target: type 우선할 수에 개체를 지정 하는 매개 변수는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>발생 하는 특성 개체의 통합을 포함는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>개체 집합에 대 한 기본 serialization 동작을 재정의할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: 특성 개체에서 배치를 선택는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>재정의 하려는 특정 동작에 따라.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>기본적으로 XML 요소로 클래스 멤버를 serialize 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as an XML attribute instead, you would create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 대신 XML 특성으로 serialize 할 멤버를 원하는 경우 만들어야는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>에 할당 된 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> 추가</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Add 메서드를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> 를</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> 추가 하려면

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to add a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 이 오버 로드를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>에 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> 를 포함 하</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> 는 추가 하려면

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> overrides the serialization of a class, you need not specify a member of the class to override, only the type of the class.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>직렬화를 재정의의 클래스를 지정 하지 않아도 클래스의 형식에만 재정의 하는 클래스의 멤버</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>재정의 되는 개체의.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> 재정의 특성을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> to the collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> objects contained by the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> 의 컬렉션에 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> 에 포함 된 개체는 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The type parameter specifies the object to be overridden by the .
trans-unit.target: type 우선할 수에 개체를 지정 하는 매개 변수는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The member parameter specifies the name of a member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: member 매개 변수 재정의 되는 멤버의 이름을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>발생 하는 특성 개체의 통합을 포함는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>개체 집합에 대 한 기본 serialization 동작을 재정의할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: 특성 개체에서 배치를 선택는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>재정의 하려는 특정 동작에 따라.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>기본적으로 XML 요소로 클래스 멤버를 serialize 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as a SOAP attribute instead, you would create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 대신 SOAP 특성으로 serialize 할 멤버를 원하는 경우 만들어야는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>에 할당 된 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> 추가</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>메서드는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> 를</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> 사용 하 여

trans-unit.source: Use this method when the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains either a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute><xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여는 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>중 하나가 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute><xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>, 또는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute></xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to override.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>재정의 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to override.
trans-unit.target: 재정의할 멤버의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> 재정의 특성을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base class) type.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 (기본 클래스) 형식과 연결 된 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains attributes for a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 이 오버 로드를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>에 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> 에 대 한 특성을 포함 하</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> 는 반환

trans-unit.source: The base class <xref:System.Type> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 기본 클래스 <xref:System.Type>검색 하려는 특성의 컬렉션와 연결 된.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> 재정의 특성의 컬렉션을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base class) type.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 (기본 클래스) 형식과 연결 된 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The member parameter specifies the base class member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: member 매개 변수 재정의 되는 기본 클래스 멤버를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains attributes that override a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 이 오버 로드를 사용 하 여 반환 하는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>재정의 하는 특성을 포함 하는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>, 또는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: You can also return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains the override of a default value that uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>에 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> 를 사용 하 여 기본값을 재정의 포함 하</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> 는 반환할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, you must use the overload that specifies only the overridden type.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>포함 한 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, 재정의 된 형식만 지정 하는 오버 로드를 사용 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The base class <xref:System.Type> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to override.
trans-unit.target: 기본 클래스 <xref:System.Type>재정의 하려는 특성의 컬렉션와 연결 된.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The name of the overridden member that specifies the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> to return.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 재정의 된 멤버의 이름에서 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> 돌아갑니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> 재정의 특성의 컬렉션을 나타내는입니다.
